summary: REQ-8/9/10 appear implemented on the frontend via QR payload encode/decode utilities, QR code SVG generation, and scan auto-fill (with fallback) while keeping fields editable. REQ-11 (producing and sharing a single working deployed URL) is not satisfied by code changes; the diff adds a 'Copy Live Link' button and documentation but does not provide an actual deployed URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: After implementing and deploying the QR generation + full auto-fill feature, provide the user with the updated live website link (a single, working URL).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff introduces utilities/UI to copy the current origin and adds deployment instructions, but no actual deployed live URL is produced/shared in the changes shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a 'Copy Live Link' button in the dashboard header and clipboard-copy utilities to copy the current site origin.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-11 asks to provide a single working deployed URL after deployment; it does not explicitly request implementing an in-app live-link copy feature/button.

hallucinated_features.description: Added deployment verification documentation describing how to obtain/share the live URL and how to test QR features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Documentation is not requested by any of REQ-8/9/10/11 (REQ-11 requires the actual URL, not deployment instructions).
